MY NEW PAGE ABOUT DRUMMING

What do you know about drumming ?

What do you know about the drums?

Did you know that drums are one of the oldest musical instruments in the world.

Drums, made with alligator skins, have been found in China dating back to 5500-2350 BC!

Drums have more uses than just being musical.

Throughout history they have also been used for communication over great distances.


Interesting facts about drums and drumming

  1. Drums were with us from the dawn of mankind.
  2. Modern configuration of drum sets become in use during first years of 20th century.
  3. Brushes that create softer drum sound were used in drumming ever since 1920s.
  4. Drums are the most important part of the rhythm section of any band.
